'''The thief''' appears in "[[The One With The Cat]]", portrayed by Marc Unger. 

When [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] is trying to sell the entertainment unit in his apartment, he ends up getting in to prove that it is big enough to hold a grown man. While in the unit, the thief puts a hockey stick through the handles, trapping Joey and stealing nearly everything in the apartment.

The burglar leaves a message on the Magna Doodle: "Thanks for all your stuff!"
